      • Issue

        public Issue(int issueId,
             java.lang.String state,
             java.lang.String issueType,
             java.lang.String summary,
             java.lang.String owner,
             boolean confirmed,
             java.lang.String resolution,
             java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> notes)
        Constructor for Issue
        Parameters:
        issueId - the id of the issue
        state - the state of the issue
        issueType - the type of issue
        summary - summary of the issue
        owner - the person tasked with fixing it
        confirmed - whether or not the issue is confirmed to exist
        resolution - has it been solved, and how so
        notes - , general background notes on the issue
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if parameter is invalid, or an invalid combination of parameters occur
